pages.text: Bu xindao erqie fouren wo de jixiang de ren, shi huo yu de jumin.

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen dang mingji zhenzhu suo ci nimen de endian. Dangshi, youyi huo ren yu dui nimen shizhan wuli, dan zhenzhu wei nimen diyu tamen de wuli; nimen dang jingwei zhenzhu. Jiao xinshimen zhi xintuo zhenzhu.

Zhenzhu yu yiselie de houyi que yi diyue, bing cong tamen zhong paichu shi'er ge shouling. Zhenzhu shuo:`Wo que yu nimen tong zai. Ruguo nimen jin shou bai gong, wanna tian ke, quexin wo de zhong shizhe, bing xiezhu tamen, bing yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu, wo bi gouxiao nimen de zui'e, wo bi rang nimen jinru xia lin zhu he de leyuan. Cihou, shui bu xindao, shui yi mishile zhenglu.'

Zhi wei tamen pohuai mengyue, wo qi juele tamen, bing shi tamen de xin biancheng jianying de; tamen cuangai jing wen, bing paoqi ziji suo shou de yibufen quan jie. Chu tamen zhong de shaoshu ren wai, ni changchang fa jian tamen jianzha, gu ni dang raoshu tamen, yuanliang tamen. Zhenzhu que shi xi'ai xingshan zhe de.
